functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.

msg.content: What are the current home stadiums of the teams that won the last 10 UEFA European Championships (EURO)?
What are the current home stadiums of the teams that won the last 10 UEFA European Championships (EURO)?

functions.name: search
functions.desc: Search Wikipedia for an article with the given title, and get its content. If no such article is found, return similar article names.

msg.name: search

msg.content:
The current home stadiums of the teams that won the last 10 UEFA European Championships (EURO) are as follows:

1. Portugal (2016) - Estádio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica (Estádio da Luz) - SL Benfica
2. Spain (2012) - Estadio Santiago Bernabéu - Real Madrid
3. Spain (2008) - Camp Nou - FC Barcelona
4. Greece (2004) - Olympic Stadium of Athens "Spiros Louis" - AEK Athens
5. France (2000) - Stade de France - France National Team
6. Germany (1996) - Olympiastadion Berlin - Hertha BSC
7. Denmark (1992) - Parken Stadium - FC Copenhagen
8. Netherlands (1988) - Johan Cruyff Arena - AFC Ajax
9. France (1984) - Parc des Princes - Paris Saint-Germain
10. West Germany (1980) - Olympiastadion Munich - FC Bayern Munich

Here are the current home stadiums of the teams that won the last 10 UEFA European Championships (EURO):

3. **Spain (2008)** - Camp Nou - FC Barcelona

7. **Denmark (1992)** - Parken Stadium - FC Copenhagen

9. **France (1984)** - Parc des Princes - Paris Saint-Germain
10. **West Germany (1980)** - Olympiastadion Munich - FC Bayern Munich
